message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement quickly.
I think we should meet in the middle, but I want a bit more since I'm taking the risk of the money devaluing faster for me.
I'm willing to split the money evenly this time. We both lose money with each passing round, so I think a 50/50 split is the best way to maximize our gains.
